definition: west/west side/western part/to the west of
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
suffix of a noun of locality
lit. the sun rises in the west (idiom)/fig. hell freezes over/pigs can fly
pinyin: tai4 yang2 cong2 xi1 bian1 chu1 lai2

definition: erhua variant of 西邊|西边[xi1 bian1]

sentences.english: The shed was formerly connected on its western side to the inner chambers. My mother sometimes would come over here.
sentences.chinese: 房子的西边和内室相连，先母曾经来过一次。

sentences.english: Thee lions emigrated to the western woods.
sentences.chinese: 狮群移居到西边的树林里。

sentences.english: There are some doubters even in the western villages.
sentences.chinese: 就是在西边的村落里也有一些怀疑者。

sentences.english: A silver gull slips down from the west.
sentences.chinese: 一只银色的海鸥从西边滑降。

sentences.english: A stiff wind howled from the west, thankfully warmed by the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 冷硬的风从西边呼啸过来，感谢夏日的阳光温暖着它。

sentences.english: Austrian body west Zhongguancun, as well as Beijing's largest university town.
sentences.chinese: 奥体的西边是中关村，以及北京最大的大学城。

sentences.english: Passing Fifty-ninth Street, he took the west side of Central Park, which he followed to Seventy-eighth Street.
sentences.chinese: 过了五十九街，他沿着中央公园的西边走到七十八街。

sentences.english: Overnight the ship drifted in a long arc to the west.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之间，这艘船漂向了西边，留下一道长长的。

sentences.english: West of Peking, the builders struck sticky clay.
sentences.chinese: 在北京西边，修筑者们遇到了粘土。

sentences.english: I think the splendid building on the west side must be the Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 我想西边那座宏伟建筑一定是人民大会堂了。

sentences.english: There's a strong current runs along the south, and then away nor'ard up the west coast.
sentences.chinese: 南边有一股很强的水流，沿着西边的海岸往北流。

sentences.english: The sun never rises in the west.
sentences.chinese: 太阳绝不会从西边升上来。

sentences.english: Or a piping hot ball of fire that looked west across the sky?
sentences.chinese: 或是看着西边那个滚热的火球划过天际？

sentences.english: West of Circular Quay is The Rocks.
sentences.chinese: 环形码头西边就是岩石区。

sentences.english: By evening, the sun should be down, and the west of the red clouds seem so charming.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，太阳要下山了，西边的红云显得那么迷人。

sentences.english: The west will also have the additional requirement of mechanical louvers .
sentences.chinese: 西边还要求另加机械百叶窗。

definition: east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]
erhua variant of 西邊|西边[xi1 bian1]
